publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2841 Patricia Ferguson on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Sexual Offences (Procedure and Evidence) (Scotland) Bill and Fur Farming (Prohibition) (Scotland) Bill - Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees that the time for consideration of Stage 3 of the Sexual Offences (Procedure and Evidence) (Scotland) Bill and Stages 2 and 3 of the Fur Farming (Prohibition) (Scotland) Bill be allocated as follows, so that debate on each part of the proceedings, if not previously brought to a conclusion, shall be brought to a conclusion at the time specified below– Sexual Offences (Procedure and Evidence) (Scotland) Bill Group 1 to Group 4 – no later than 3.45 p.m. Group 5 and Group 6 – no later than 4.15 p.m. Motion to pass the Bill – no later than 4.45 p.m. Fur Farming (Prohibition) (Scotland) Bill Stage 2 – no later than 4.50 p.m. Stage 3 – no later than 5.00 p.m. Supported by: Euan Robson*
